Title: The main tasks of the cultural revolution
Designer: Tianjin People's Fine Arts Publishing House (天津人民美术出版社)
Publisher: Tianjin People's Fine Arts Publishing House (天津人民美术出版社)
Notes: The fourth poster of a four poster set from 1958, "The General Line in socialist construction explained in pictures" (社会主义建设总路线图解).The cultural revolution includes education, study, (laboratory) research, medical care, sports, and hygiene.
